name: NTI Partition File
summary: Learn about .NPF files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: NTI DriveBackup! is included with HP's Media Vault backup device. The product also includes NTI Image Explorer, which can be used for browsing and extracting individual files and folders.
NOTE: NewTech Infosystems no longer develops the older NTI Backup NOW! and NTI DriveBackup! programs. Instead they now develop NTI Backup Now ("Now" instead of "NOW!").

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
